text.description:
{Ring of Banes}

Increases effectiveness of some spells:
Curse reduces the target's Damage by an additional 1.
Weakness reduces Attack by an additional 1.
Slow reduces Speed by an additional 1.
Disrupting Ray reduces Defense by an additional 1.
text.event: During your travels, a mad mage picks a fight with you and starts casting multiple fireballs at you. A single lightning bolt from your fingers zaps the mage to a crisp, leaving only dust and a magic ring.
text.name: Ring of Banes
